Container.Name: derbynet_server
Container.Overview: DerbyNet is the new standard in race management software for Pinewood Derby events. It's free, and it's open source. With DerbyNet, multiple browsers connect to a web server running on your laptop or in the cloud.
Container.DonateText: If you like the docker feel free to send a tip.
